name: Blockbound
description:
Blockbound is a block sliding puzzle game where you need to cover all green squares on the screen to progress to the next level. 

The game has 6 basic rules:

  • You need to cover all green squares in order to progress
  • Different colored blocks stick to each other, but the same colored ones are not
  • You can push same colored blocks, but you cannot pull them
  • The entire bound block acts like one single object, if it hits something, it stops the entire bound block
  • If a block comes to contact with an another one while moving which can be stick to while moving, it will move along with it
  • You can disconnect block when they start moving if part of the bound block is blocked by a barrier

With these basic rules you can complete a variety of puzzles.

Controls

The controls are simple: just click on a red or blue block that you want to move, drag the mouse to the desired direction, and release the mouse button. No keyboard required.
